entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as a short, plump woman with a very kind face, though her eyes are presently narrowed with suspicion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being spotted by Mrs. Weasley and smiling at her.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as Harry's brothers, with whom he is angry.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as hesitating when asked by Mrs. Weasley what had happened.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley spoke to Mrs. Weasley, answering her question about what had happened.
Harry is angry with Fred and George.
